channel.title: Incident Detection 🐕 on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Incident Detection 🐕 on Analyst

item.title: Incident Detection 🗒
item.description: Here are the guidelines, a plan and some cheatsheets related to incident detection. Some insights from the dark side of the fence… .

item.title: Firewalls 🔥
item.description: Firewalls monitor access from the outside network to the inside network. Traffic originating from inside the network would not pass through the firewall.???

item.title: IDS And IPS ✋
item.description: Host-based IDS look for local system configurations and behaviour, while network-based IDS look for network connections and looks for anomalies and common signatures.

item.title: Distributed Systems Security
item.description: This one was written during my preparation to the GCFA exam and is also essential for my CISSP certification preparation.

item.title: Phishing 🎣
item.description: Phishing, aka brand spoofing, aka carding - various scam that primarily use e-mail messages to trick a person into divulging personal information.

item.title: Point of Sale Breach 💳
item.description: The main purpose is to steal the 16-digit card number 💳. Restraunts, retail, frocey are the most affected.

item.title: Evasion Techniques 🦑
item.description: Evasion techniques and what possible forensic footprints they are likely to leave? VPN Virtual private network.
